message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the product sounds great. I'd like to propose a price of $100 to purchase it.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm proposing a price of $130 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the product's value and my budget, I would like to counter with an offer of $120.
I understand you're getting close to your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm proposing a price of $125 for the product.
